segment.source: Network access Restrict anonymous access to Named Pipes and Shares (Windows 10)
segment.target: Network access Restrict anonymous access to Named Pipes and Shares (Windows 10)

segment.source: Describes the best practices, location, values, policy management and security considerations for the Network access Restrict anonymous access to Named Pipes and Shares security policy setting.
segment.target: Describes the best practices, location, values, policy management and security considerations for the Network access Restrict anonymous access to Named Pipes and Shares security policy setting.

segment.source: Network access: Restrict anonymous access to Named Pipes and Shares
segment.target: Network access: Restrict anonymous access to Named Pipes and Shares

segment.source: Describes the best practices, location, values, policy management and security considerations for the Network access: Restrict anonymous access to Named Pipes and Shares security policy setting.
segment.target: Describes the best practices, location, values, policy management and security considerations for the Network access: Restrict anonymous access to Named Pipes and Shares security policy setting.

segment.source: This policy setting enables or disables the restriction of anonymous access to only those shared folders and pipes that are named in the Network access: Named pipes that can be accessed anonymously and Network access: Shares that can be accessed anonymously settings.
segment.target: This policy setting enables or disables the restriction of anonymous access to only those shared folders and pipes that are named in the Network access: Named pipes that can be accessed anonymously and Network access: Shares that can be accessed anonymously settings.

segment.source: The setting controls null session access to shared folders on your computers by adding RestrictNullSessAccess with the value 1 in the registry key HKEYLOCALMACHINESystemCurrentControlSetServicesLanManServerParameters.
segment.target: The setting controls null session access to shared folders on your computers by adding RestrictNullSessAccess with the value 1 in the registry key HKEYLOCALMACHINESystemCurrentControlSetServicesLanManServerParameters.

segment.source: This registry value toggles null session shared folders on or off to control whether the Server service restricts unauthenticated clients' access to named resources.
segment.target: This registry value toggles null session shared folders on or off to control whether the Server service restricts unauthenticated clients' access to named resources.

segment.source: Null sessions are a weakness that can be exploited through the various shared folders on the devices in your environment.
segment.target: Null sessions are a weakness that can be exploited through the various shared folders on the devices in your environment.

segment.source: Enabling this policy setting restricts null session access to unauthenticated users to all server pipes and shared folders except those listed in the NullSessionPipes and NullSessionShares registry entries.
segment.target: Enabling this policy setting restricts null session access to unauthenticated users to all server pipes and shared folders except those listed in the NullSessionPipes and NullSessionShares registry entries.

segment.source: Computer ConfigurationWindows SettingsSecurity SettingsLocal PoliciesSecurity Options
segment.target: Computer ConfigurationWindows SettingsSecurity SettingsLocal PoliciesSecurity Options

segment.source: The following table lists the actual and effective default values for this policy.
segment.target: The following table lists the actual and effective default values for this policy.

segment.source: Default values are also listed on the policy’s property page.
segment.target: Default values are also listed on the policy’s property page.

segment.source: This section describes features and tools that are available to help you manage this policy.
segment.target: This section describes features and tools that are available to help you manage this policy.

segment.source: Changes to this policy become effective without a device restart when they are saved locally or distributed through Group Policy.
segment.target: Changes to this policy become effective without a device restart when they are saved locally or distributed through Group Policy.

segment.source: This section describes how an attacker might exploit a feature or its configuration, how to implement the countermeasure, and the possible negative consequences of countermeasure implementation.
segment.target: This section describes how an attacker might exploit a feature or its configuration, how to implement the countermeasure, and the possible negative consequences of countermeasure implementation.

segment.source: Null sessions are a weakness that can be exploited through shared folders (including the default shared folders) on devices in your environment.
segment.target: Null sessions are a weakness that can be exploited through shared folders (including the default shared folders) on devices in your environment.

segment.source: Enable the Network access: Restrict anonymous access to Named Pipes and Shares setting.
segment.target: Enable the Network access: Restrict anonymous access to Named Pipes and Shares setting.

segment.source: You can enable this policy setting to restrict null-session access for unauthenticated users to all server pipes and shared folders except those that are listed in the NullSessionPipes and NullSessionShares entries.
segment.target: You can enable this policy setting to restrict null-session access for unauthenticated users to all server pipes and shared folders except those that are listed in the NullSessionPipes and NullSessionShares entries.
